snippet: Wilson Kipsang, Lelisa Desisa and Gebre Gebremariam, the podium finishers in last year’s men’s race, will run again in November.
abstract: Wilson Kipsang, Lelisa Desisa and Gebre Gebremariam, 2014 New York City Marathon podium winners, will return to compete in 2015 race.
lead_paragraph: Wilson Kipsang, Lelisa Desisa and Gebre Gebremariam, the podium finishers in last year’s men’s race, will run again in November.

headline.main: Top Three Returning to New York City Marathon
